name: Gravity of the Situation (pixelcatdev)
description:
Controls - W/D - Move left/right

Spacebar - Cycle through gravity directions

R - Restart level

Help the nameless little fella get the crates into the descriptionless black hole by manipulating the orientation of each levels gravity, but be wary. Hitting spikes with either the little fella or a crate will cause the level to reset.

Built in one evening using Unity, this was more of a wakeup project after a 2 month hiatus of not touching any gamedev. There's no sound or music, so crack on your favourite playlist and get frustrated in some truly annoying but addictive puzzles. For more of my on-going work, follow me over on Twitter and Instagram @pixelcatdev

- PixelCat
